page.title: 03LIFE STYLES - Lydham/More
page.content: Smart casual dress for Church. Babies wear stretch suits, disposable nappies and easy care dungarees when older. This summer the mini is in fashion for teenagers. Older people tend to wear suits with no variation in length. {Materials}are easily cared for man- made or polyester cotton mixtures. {Clothes:}Expensive jumpers and blouses {Â£12-Â£20,}dresses, coats, suits{Â£60-Â£70 Many people use Jumble Sales for bargain buys, buttons, zips and wool. Anoraks worn for casual wear by all ages and sexes. In rural areas like ours choice is limited and travel difficult. {Mail order catalogues often used for shopping. Everything can be purchased from catalogues and goods paid for in instalments.{Hair- {dressers}visit peoples homes. Salons mainly uni-sex , with many also doing ear piercing and beauty treatments.
